scripts.build:site: sass src/assets/scss/main.scss dist/assets/css/main.css && node scripts/build-site.js && mkdir -p dist/assets/webfonts dist/assets/fonts/Roboto_Condensed dist/assets/fonts/DM_Serif_Text && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* dist/assets/webfonts/ && cp src/assets/fonts/Roboto_Condensed/RobotoCondensed-VariableFont_wght.ttf src/assets/fonts/Roboto_Condensed/RobotoCondensed-Italic-VariableFont_wght.ttf dist/assets/fonts/Roboto_Condensed/ && cp src/assets/fonts/DM_Serif_Text/DMSerifText-Regular.ttf src/assets/fonts/DM_Serif_Text/DMSerifText-Italic.ttf dist/assets/fonts/DM_Serif_Text/
